## PoiManager.addTextureAtlas() method

Load the texture atlas that defines the segments of the texture that should be used for specific icons. Creates an \[\[ImageTexture\]\] for every element in the atlas, such that it can be addressed in the theme file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addTextureAtlas(imageName: string, atlas: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imageName | string | Name of the image from the theme (NOT the url!). |
|  atlas | string | URL of the JSON file defining the texture atlas. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
